name: VoiceActivity
author: Neodymium
description: Shows icons and info in popouts, the member list, and more when someone is in a voice channel.

changelog.title: Added
items: Added French translations (Thanks to Piquixel on GitHub!)

changelog.title: Fixed
items: Attempted to fix issues with the newest Discord update.
NOTE: Discord broke a lot, including BD itself, so the plugin may experience issues until BD is updated and I can update the plugin accordingly.
